caption.p: Morphology of Sf9 cells exposed to compounds 3b (100 µg/mL) and 3e (50 µg/mL) after 24 h of incubation (S Plan Fluor ELWD 40× DIC N1 objective). Overall cell morphology was evaluated using phalloidin (actin) and DAPI (chromatin status). Yellow arrow: chromatin fragmentation; green arrow: chromatin condensation; C: control. Color blind-friendly image in Supplementary Figure S1.
